revisionDesc.change: Created new header and reorganized structure.
Applied new word-level tagging and other large-scale revisions.
Added verse divisions using XSL scripts.
Proofread, corrected errors, and updated markup.

div2.fw: 3It is likely, but not certain, that this is a quire number denoting the third quire from what was formerly a complete copy of the poem. See the "Collation" section in the description of the manuscript for a full discussion.

xvjIt is likely, but not certain, that this is a quire number from an earlier version of this book, some quires of which are now lost. It is also possible that this should be transcribed xus. See the "Collation" section in the description of the manuscript for a full discussion.

l.seg: d þanne preied he Iosephus to preche

seg.note: The supralinear e would seem to indicate the ordinal sixte, but only the cardinal form seems to make sense in this context.
